import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Product } from '../../model/Product'; export interface Props { addProduct: (product:Product)=> void productEdit:Product editProduct:(product:Product)=>void }; export default function Form(props:Props) { const [newProduct, setNewProduct] = useState(props.productEdit); console.log(newProduct); const editProduct =()=>{ setNewProduct({...newProduct, [newProduct.productId]: props.productEdit.productId}) props.editProduct(newProduct) } return (
{setNewProduct({...newProduct, name: e.target.value})}} className="name-product" value={newProduct.name} />
{setNewProduct({...newProduct, price: Number(e.target.value)})}} className="price-product" value={newProduct.price}/>
{setNewProduct({...newProduct, image: e.target.value})}} className="img-product" value={newProduct.image}/>
{setNewProduct({...newProduct, desc: e.target.value})}} className="desc-product" value={newProduct.desc}/>
{/* */}
) }
